metadata.description:
FCBD Special Preview! 

For the creators of the hit Misadventures of Adam West series, comes the out of this world spin-off featuring everyone's favorite Boy Wonder, Burt Ward.  After playing Robin on the Batman TV show, Burt still needs to be a hero and along with a couple of friends saves the world again and again!
metadata.name: Wrath of the Titans: Cyclops/Burt Ward Boy Wonder FCBD
